Class CourseLite

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.controller.CourseLite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CourseLite
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Trimmed down version of course class to use for sending over a socket en lieu of JSON / XML
    Author:
    Jerome Gobeil
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
